content.content: EIP-1 doesn’t specify how naming conventions are developed and propagated. Discussions are bubbling about naming upgrades and branches. And EIPs, like this one, run into issues of how much to align with existing standards. Should there be a broader, systemic way to address these questions? How important or unimportant is it?
content.GPT-summary: The author of the proposal is asking for feedback on the issue of naming conventions in EIP-1. They are discussing the challenges of aligning with existing standards and wondering if there should be a broader, systemic way to address these questions. A 3rd party is giving constructive criticism and asking questions about the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback
